data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations') - Clarification On News In Mainstream Media.
data.news_body: This is with reference to the media reports regarding launching of a startup '' iVP Semi'' which is entering into semi conductor industry. In this regard, we would like to clarify that such entity is distinct from IVP Limited, the reporting Company, and it is not related in any manner with the reporting Company or its Promoters/Directors.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI(PIT) Regulations, 2015, and in compliance with company''s code for regulating, monitoring and reporting trading by an insider, We wish to inform that the trading window of the Company will be closed for all the designated persons of the company w.e.f. July 01, 2024 and will remain closed till 48 hours after the declaration of unaudited financial results of the company for the quarter ended June 30, 2024 and becoming generally available. The date of consideration of the aforesaid financial results shall be intimated in due course.

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 - Clarification On Price Movement
data.news_body: There is no information/ announcement (including impending announcement) which in our opinion may have bearing on price/volume behaviour of the scrip and which is required to be disclosed to the Stock Exchange(s), in terms of Regulation 30 of SEBI(LODR) Reg, 2024.Further, please note that the Company''s management in no way connected with the increase in the price/Volume of the Company''s Scrip.Therefore, the increase in the price/Volume is of the Company''s Scrip is purely market driven on which the company neither has any control nor has any knowledge of the reasons.The Company follows high standards of disclosure and compliances and has promptly updated the Stock Exchanges about all material or important events from time to time.

data.caption: Clarification sought from IVP Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from IVP Ltd on June 18, 2024 with reference to significant movement in price, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Intimation Regarding Execution Of Steam Purchase Agreement
data.news_body: In furtherance to our letter dated 23rd May, 2024, bearing reference no. IVPSEC/SE/121/05/24-25, we wish to inform you that both the parties to the steam purchase agreement have executed the agreement today i.e. on 05th June, 2024. However, entering into such agreement is recurring in nature and falls under ordinary course of business of the company, which is not covered under regulation 30 of SEBI(LODR) Regulations, 2015 read with Schedule III of Listing regulations along with details required under circular No. SEBI/HO/CFD/CFD-PoD-1/P/CIR/2023/123 dated 13th July, 2023

data.news_body: Please find enclosed copy of the Annual Secretarial Compliance Report dated May 23, 2024, for the financial year 2023-24, issued by M/s. Amit Jaste & Associates, Practicing Company Secretaries.

data.caption: Intimation Regarding In-Principle Board Approval For Execution Of Agreement
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulations 30(4)(i)(c) read with para B of Part A Schedule III of the SEBI(LODR) Regulations, 2015, the Board of Directors of the company in its meetings held today i.e. on 23rd May, 2024, have given In-Principle approval to the execution of agreement for purchase of Steam at its factory situated at Tarapur, Boisar.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulations 30  read with Para A of Part A of schedule III of SEBI(LODR)Regulations, 2015, the Board  as approved the following: I. To continue the Directorship of Mr. T. K. Gowrishankar in accordance with regulation 17(1A) of SEBI(LODR) Regulations, 2015.II. Appointment of Cost Auditor & Secretarial Auditor for the Financial year 2024-25.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 23Rd May, 2024
data.news_body: Approved the Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2024 pursuant to Regulation 33 of Listing Regulations;Recommended a final dividend of 10% (i.e. Rs. 1/- per share) on Equity shares of Rs. 10/- eachfor the financial year ended March 31, 2024.The said dividend, if declared by the members at the 95th Annual General Meeting will becredited/dispatched within the prescribed time as per the Companies Act, 2013.other disclosures as per Reg 30 of SEBI(LODR) Reg, 2015.

data.caption: Results - Financial Results 31St March, 2022
data.news_body:
1. Approved the Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended 31st March, 2022 pursuant to Regulation 33 of Listing Regulations and recommended a final dividend of 15% (i.e. Rs. 1.5/- per share) on Equity shares of Rs.10/- each for the financial year ended 31st March, 2022.

The said dividend, if declared by the members at the 93rd Annual General Meeting will be credited/dispatched within the prescribed time as per the Companies Act, 2013.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 11Th November, 2021
data.news_body:
1. Please find the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2021 duly approved by the Board of Directors at their Meeting held on 11th November, 2021 along with the Limited Review Report thereon by the Auditors M/s. Rajendra & Co., Chartered Accountants.
2. The Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e., 11th November, 2021, have approved the appointment of Mr. Anwar Chauhan (DIN: 00322114) as an Additional Director (Non-Executive, Non-Independent) to hold office of Director upto the date of ensuing Annual General Meeting of the Company. (Annexure A)
3. Mr. Sajid M. Fazalbhoy (DIN: 00022760) has resigned as the Independent Director of the Company with effect from close of business hours of 11th November, 2021. The Board of Directors have noted the above resignation and placed on record its sincere appreciation for Mr. Fazalbhoy's valuable services, guidance and contribution to the Company during his tenure. (Annexure B)

2021 duly approved by the Board of Directors at their Meeting held on 28 July, 2021 along with the
Limited Review Report thereon by the Auditors M/s. Rajendra & Co., Chartered Accountants.
2. Approved the appointment of Mr. Ranjeev Lodha (DIN: 07478890) as an Additional Independent Director to hold office of Director upto the date of ensuing Annual General Meeting of the Company. (Annexure A)
3. We would like to inform you that the Board of Directors at their Meeting held today have noted the above resignation and placed on record its sincere appreciation for Mr. Ranjan's valuable services, guidance and contribution to the Company during his tenure.

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For 31.03.2021
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 4th June, 2021, intimating you of the Board Meeting to be held today i.e., 11th June, 2021 and in accordance with the Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors in their meeting held today have:

Approved the Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended 31st March, 2021 pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI Listing Regulations

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 11Th June, 2021
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 4th June, 2021, intimating you of the Board Meeting to be held today i.e., 11th June, 2021 and in accordance with the Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors in their meeting held today have:

1. Approved the Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended 31st March, 2021 pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI Listing Regulations and recommended a final dividend of 10% (i.e. Re. 1/- per share) on Equity shares of Rs.10/- each for the financial year ended 31st March, 2021.

The said dividend, if declared by the members at the 92nd Annual General Meeting will be credited/dispatched within the prescribed time as per the Companies Act, 2013.
